attributes.action: ADDRESS BREACHES OF CONFIDENTIALITY, ESPECIALLY FOR CELEBRITIES, WHOSE HEALTH PROBLEMS ARE REGULARLY BLASTED ACROSS THE HEADLINES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the Caldicott Report did make headway on this matter - why is people's diagnoses are still reported in the press ? ALL COMPELTELY ILLEAGAL !

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
